form_subheader_1: Your phone will arrive ready to use with a new number.
form_subheader_2: In the meantime, we'll get started on transferring your number over so you can use it with your new phone.

phone_number.label: Phone Number
phone_number.error: Phone number is invalid, please enter at least 10 digits

disclaimer.title: Note:
disclaimer.content: This is NOT the password you use to login to their website. If you are unsure if you have this, please contact your carrier

submit.error: There has been an error while trying to submit the request

request_submitted.ko: Issues encountered in porting. Need to contact customer service.

setup_line.header: Setting up your line of service

activation_complete.title: You may now turn on your device
activation_complete.activation_text: Watch our short video to learn how to turn on your Jitterbug Smart2 and get it set up so you can start making calls
activation_complete.activation_line_title: Now, get smarter about your smartphone with educational tools
activation_complete.educational_card_1_text: Informative how-to cards and videos covering basic to advanced features
activation_complete.educational_card_2_text: User guides and helpful FAQs for your GreatCall product
activation_complete.educational_card_3_text: At mygreatcall.com you can access and manage your account information

transfer_phone.title: Transfer your phone number to your new Lively Phone
transfer_phone.subtitle: Information about your previous service carrier
transfer_phone.enterPhone: Enter the 10-digit phone number you want to transfer
transfer_phone.isEligibleText: Your phone number can be transferred
transfer_phone.primaryAccountHolderTitle: Are you the primary account holder?

phoneFormDisclaimer.title: You will need the following to proceed
phoneFormDisclaimer.firstItemTitle: 1. A recent phone bill from your carrier
phoneFormDisclaimer.firstItemText: You'll need to enter the information exactly as it appears in your bill
phoneFormDisclaimer.secondItemTitle: 2. An Account Transfer PIN from your carrier
phoneFormDisclaimer.secondItemText: Please call your carrier to request an account transfer PIN. This one-time use PIN is needed to authorize your carrier to release your phone number. (Note: this is NOT the password used to log into your account ).

phoneForm.firstNameLabel: Your name ( as it appears in your phone bill )
phoneForm.noteText: This is NOT the password you use to login their website. If you are unsure if you have this, please contact your carrier.

item1.title: You are protected
item1.text: Your personal information is encrypted by verisign

footer.do_not_sell: Do Not Sell My Personal Information
